Joshua or Josue__10.13__The book of the just: In Hebrew Jasheran ancient book long since lost.
Joshua or Josue__10.37__The king: Viz., the new king, who succeeded him that was slain, ver. 26.
Joshua or Josue__10.40__Any remains therein, but slew: God ordered these people to be utterly destroyed, in punishment of their manifold abomination; and that they might not draw the Israelites into the like sins.
